item.title: Saudis instigate oil-price clash with Russia
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Oil prices crashed to their lowest levels since 2016 after Saudi Arabian state oil giant Aramco said it plans to cut prices, a move that escalates the kingdom’s clash with Russia and threatens to unleash a torrent of crude into well-supplied energy markets.

item.title: Peso firm, stocks plunge over 6% amid Covid-19
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); MANILA – The Philippine peso managed to stay firm against the US dollar Monday but the main equities index fell more than six percent due to concerns on the rise of coronavirus disease 2019 (Covid-19) cases in the country.

item.title: Virus stalks market; record 4-year low
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); SHARE prices fell on Monday, with the main index posting one of its deepest decline in years, falling by 7 percent, mainly on fears of the spread of COVID-19 in the country and its effects on the local economy, while developments overseas did not help lift sentiments.

item.title: PH stocks crash on virus fears – The Manila Times
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); The stock market plunged on Monday as reports of rising cases of the new coronavirus disease 2019 (Covid-19) spooked investors, sending the bourse back to the 6,300-territory, the lowest in four years.

item.title: Stocks slide on COVID-19 fears
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); A whopping P663 billion worth of wealth was wiped out in the local stock market on Monday as panic-selling due to the coronavirus (COVID-19) contagion and the meltdown in global oil prices dragged local equities to their worst single-day bloodbath since the US-epicentered global financial crisis 12 years ago.

item.title: Fmr. Goldman CEO Blankfein talks stock selloff

item.title: Investors urged to stay on the sidelines, as Singapore's Straits Times Index sees largest single-day drop in over 10 years

item.title: ‘The Simpsons’ Predict The Coronavirus
item.description: The latest to come out of The Simpsons future predictions is that the show predicted the Coronavirus outbreak. Let’s break it down. Did ‘The Simpsons’ Predict The Coronavirus? It’s Debatable _The Simpsons _have a reputation for predicting the future.

item.title: Watch ‘Dave’ Online – Live Stream Season 1

item.title: The Simpsons season 4 episode 21 : Predict the Coronavirus?
item.description: Did the Simpsons predict Coronavirus? Did the Simpsons Predict the Coronavirus? First predicting President Trump and now this?! See the receipts here! Everyone is talking about the Coronavirus these last few weeks…but were the Simpsons were talking about it 27 years ago?

item.title: Altered Carbon Season 1 Recap / Review
item.description: One of the most intriguing sci-fi dramas of recent years is Netflix’s ‘Altered Carbon’. Based on Richard Morgan’s book of the same name, it is set in a futuristic world where humans have found a way to cheat death.
